name: Mana Springs
description: Natural sources of pure magical energy provide unlimited power for spellcasting and magical research. The abundant magical energy provides opportunities for powerful magic and research, while the concentration of power attracts both mages and dangerous magical creatures.
atmosphere: Pure magical energy bubbles and flows while dangerous magical creatures lurk in power-rich shadows. The air crackles with unlimited power and visible auras of otherworldly intensity. Every surface vibrates with arcane resonance. Your skin tingles with magical energy and the sense of supernatural peril.
